New Records: Shreyas Iyer scored the fastest century for India in the World Cup off 62 balls
India recorded a total of 410-4 in 50 overs
Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer and KL Rahul shared 208 off 128 for the fourth wicket
Teja Nidamanuru made a half-century off 38 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took a wicket with a slower ball that completely baffled Aryan Dutt
India won the match by 160 runs
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of taking one game at a time and playing well
Netherlands skipper Scott Edwards expressed confidence in their team's style of play
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma praised his team's clinical performance and adaptability
Netherlands skipper Scott Edwards acknowledged India's pure class with the bat and expressed growth for his team
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will face New Zealand in the first semi-final on Wednesday
The Netherlands finished their World Cup campaign with defeat but performed admirably
